ai-atk-s0303a3:2_1: he obtains higher consciousness, he gains faith in the higher.
ai-atk-s0303a3:2_2: entering the sure path, asked the noble path,
ai-atk-s0303a3:2_3: They can’t die without realizing the path, in any fruit,
ai-atk-s0303a3:2_4: for in this way there is no danger,
ai-atk-s0303a3:2_6: “A person who is practicing for the fruit of stream-entry, and once-return, but who makes an effort to get upset by a person, and not being able to realize the fruit of stream-entry. The person is called a fruit of once-return.”
ai-atk-s0303a3:2_7: They look forwards and doing generate, and they forgiveness.
ai-atk-s0303a3:3_0: The Linked Discourses on comprehension is finished.
